headline: Dover (DOV) Price Target Lifted as BofA Sees Momentum Carrying Into 2026
summary: Dover Corporation (NYSE:DOV) is included among the 14 Best Dividend Aristocrats to Invest in Heading into 2026. On December 15, BofA analyst Andrew Obin raised the price target on Dover Corporation (NYSE:DOV) to $240 from $225 and maintained a Buy rating. After hosting the company’s CEO for investor meetings in New York, the firm said […]

headline: Watts Water Up 40% in a Year: How to Approach the Stock Now?
summary: Strategic acquisitions, digital expansion and cost cuts are driving WTS margins and sales higher as shares trade near a 52-week high.

headline: What You Need to Know Ahead of Dover’s Earnings Release
summary: Dover is set to report its fourth-quarter results next month, with analysts projecting low double-digit earnings growth for the period.
